content.html: company messages to me as IC: "sorry, you don't have X years of experience in [very specific thing] so we are less interested" company messages to me as a line manager: "who cares if you have no experience in product eng? managers are managers! come manage our product eng team!"

company messages to me as IC: "sorry, you don't have X years of experience in [very specific thing] so we are less interested"

company messages to me as a line manager: "who cares if you have no experience in product eng? managers are managers! come manage our product eng team!"
